exercises.title: Short Entry
exercises.text: I’m practicing calm attention, one line at a time. Consistency matters more than intensity.

exercises.title: Focus Question
exercises.text: What’s the next smallest step I can take right now?

exercises.title: Boundaries
exercises.text: I can be kind and still say no. I can be firm and still stay calm.

exercises.title: Tempo
exercises.text: Slow is smooth; smooth is fast. The key is staying relaxed while moving.

exercises.title: Closing Line
exercises.text: I’m ending this entry with one clear sentence, and then I’m done for today.

exercises.title: Less Noise
exercises.text: I don’t need more input. I need a few minutes of quiet attention.

exercises.title: Short Entry
exercises.text: I’m choosing steady effort over noisy effort. A quiet plan is better than a rushed plan.

exercises.title: Short Entry
exercises.text: Today I want to keep things simple. If I slow down, I notice more—and I make fewer mistakes.
